author: Curtis Stone
method: Preheat the oven to 170C/325F/Gas 3. In a frying pan or shallow pan sweat the shallots, garlic, chorizo and chilli in the olive oil for 2 minutes. Add the capers and vinegar and simmer for 1 minute. Add the tomato and parsley, bring to the boil and adjust the seasoning. Pour the sauce into a small ovenproof dish. Gently crack the eggs into the sauce, cover with foil and place in the oven for 3 minutes.
ingredients: 2 shallots, finely sliced,  1 clove garlic, crushed,  10 capers,  1 red chilli, finely chopped,  30ml/1fl oz olive oil,  1 tbsp sherry vinegar or red wine vinegar,  15g/Â½oz flatleaf parsley, chopped,  1 tin chopped tomatoes,  2 eggs, preferably free-range,  1oz/30g sliced chorizo, optional,  sprig of chevril
